Text: Can't believe there are no english subs for this movie...

I got excited for a minute, then I clicked on the link and my world fell apart when I didn't see English in the list of subs.

There is talk of the original being remade by Hollywood.  So no English subs is understandable since they are probably going to release this to North America at a later date.  But that still absolutely blows, cause dammit I need subs.

The above English sub is out of sync.  I re-sync'ed the English sub and it is available here:

http://subscene.com/subtitles/snabba-cash-ii/english/671402
